home.description: Ithuluzi lakho elilodwa lokuhlola, ukufezekisa okungakuhle, nokuvula amandla akho aphelele.
home.takeControl: Ulungele ukuthatha kontrola yemisebenzi yakho? Qala manje!

about.title: Mayelana ne-Taskly
about.text1: I-Taskly iyinsiza yakho eqondile emhlabeni wokuphathwa kwemisebenzi. Sihlanganisile ubuchwepheshe be-AI obuthuthukile nokwakhiwa okulula ukuze sakhe ipulatifomu ehlela imisebenzi yakho kodwa ikusize ngempela ukuthi uphumelele.
about.text2: Noma ngabe ungumsebenzi ophithizelayo okhulisa imiklamo eminingi, umfundi ophakathi kwezemfundo nezemidlalo, noma othile ofuna ukuhlela impilo yakhe yansuku zonke, i-Taskly ilungele izidingo zakho ezikhethekile.

features.title: Phatha Isikhathi Ngempumelelo
features.text: Gada zonke imisebenzi yakho futhi uphathe isikhathi sakho kahle ngemisebenzi ye-Taskly.

features.title: Imibono Eminingi
features.text: Shintsha phakathi kwezinhlu, ibhodi, nezinsuku ukuze uhlele imisebenzi yakho ngendlela efanele.

features.title: Ukusebenza Okuzikhethela
features.text: Lungisa izinkambu nezinhlelo ukuze uthuthukise ukuphathwa kwemisebenzi yakho.

feature1.title: Usizo Oluhlosiwe lwe-AI
feature1.text: Ukuhlanganiswa kwe-AI ye-Taskly kukusiza ukuba ube phezulu kumisebenzi yakho ngokusikisela imisebenzi futhi uyifunde phansi, ikugcina uphephile futhi uhlelekile.
points: Umbhalo u-Phendula ukuze ufunde imisebenzi ngokukhuluma

feature2.title: Gada Inqubekelaphambili & Ngena
feature2.text: Gada imisebenzi yakho, gade amahora akho okusebenza, bese uphumelela nabanye kubhodi ye-leaderboard uma uqeda imisebenzi.

feature3.title: Thola Imiklomelo & Thola Imibiko
feature3.text: Thola imiklomelo yokuphothula imisebenzi, bese uthola imibiko ephelele enezithombe ezihlanganisiwe kumsebenzi wakho.
